definition: prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

sentences.english: No one is certain how the two pilots made it to Leichou Pantao (also known as Leizhou or Luichow Peninsula).
sentences.chinese: 沒有人十分清楚這兩個飛行員是如何到達雷州半島的。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the ecology of Suneus murinus in countryside of Leizhou peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解雷州半島農村臭鼩鼱的生態情況。

sentences.english: The administrative division of Xuwen County in the Han Dynasty included the greater part of Leizhou Peninsula except Lianjiang City.
sentences.chinese: 漢徐聞縣政區包括除廉江市的雷州半島的大部。

sentences.english: It is bordered by Qiongzhou Strait in the north and is facing Leizhou Peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 海口北臨瓊州海峽，與雷州半島遙相對峙。

sentences.english: Zhanjiang port is located in the Leizhou Peninsula, Guangdong Province, the southern tip of mainland China.
sentences.chinese: 湛江港位於中國大陸最南端的廣東省雷州半島上。

sentences.english: Hainan province is offshore across from the Leizhou Peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 其雷州半島與海南省隔海相望。

sentences.english: The land exploitation of Leizhou Peninsula is no exception.
sentences.chinese: 歷史時期雷州半島的土地開發亦不例外。

sentences.english: Discussed in this paper are the morphology, genera and species of diatoms in different diatomite deposits of Guangdong Province.
sentences.chinese: 本文論述雷州半島各硅藻土礦牀中的硅藻形態和種屬。

sentences.english: The Teochew people, the people in Hailufeng and the people in Leizhou Peninsula all speak a language similar to Min.
sentences.chinese: 在海陸豐和雷州半島地區，人們講的語言類似於閩語。

sentences.english: Therefore, high efficient phosphoric fertilizers had wide prospects of application in Leizhou Peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 因此，高效磷肥在雷州半島地區有廣闊的應用前景。
